params.transactionId: The ID of the transaction to confirm.

constructor.details: Initializes the multi-sig wallet with a list of owners and the required number of confirmations.

executeTransaction(uint256).details: Executes a transaction if it has enough confirmations.

params.transactionId: The ID of the transaction to execute.

isConfirmed(uint256).details: Checks if a transaction has enough confirmations.

params.transactionId: The ID of the transaction to check.

returns._0: bool True if the transaction is confirmed, false otherwise.

submitTransaction(address,uint256,bytes).details: Submits a new transaction to the wallet.

params.data: The data to send with the transaction.
params.destination: The destination address of the transaction.
params.value: The value to send with the transaction.

returns.transactionId: The ID of the new transaction.
